forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High near 15C. Winds S at 40 to 65 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 59F. Winds S at 35 to 50 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%. Localized flooding is possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Localized flooding is possible.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning giving way to a few showers during the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 57F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low 4C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High 59F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
